text:
Iman Budhi Santosa (28 March 1948 – 10 December 2020), commonly known as IBS, was an Indonesian author. Many of his poems and novels were based on Javanese cultural. He published "Ziarah Tanah Jawa" ("Pilgrimage to the Land of Java"), a collection of poems written between 2006 and 2012, in 2013.
Santosa died on 10 December 2020 in Yogyakarta, Indonesia from a heart attack, aged 72.
